- Updated UI with pizza restaurant theme (red, orange, yellow color scheme)
- Created interactive dashboard with shortcut cards to all management pages
- Added navigation bar with links to all main features
- Implemented proper foreign key relationships and cascade operations
- Seeded database with sample pizza restaurant data
